MALIKJEE-WATCHED YOUR GENESIS TODAY. IT WAS AN EXCELLENT UPLOAD. GR8 MOVIE WITH BIBLICAL UNDERTONES. THANKS FOR THE SAME. HOWEVER, I WUD LIKE TO REQUEST TO PLS INCLUDE THE ENDING CREDITS ALSO TILL THE CUSTOMARY "THE END" COMES AS WITHOUT THAT, SOMEWHERE, THE REAL CONTENTMENT IS MISSING - RGDS - LOVEPAREEK

DEAR MALIKJEE - GREATLY DISAPPOINTED BY YOUR SANJHI. WAS WATCHING IT JUST NOW BUT WAS IN FOR A RUDE JOLT WHEN THE MOVIE ENDED INCOMPLETE. I GUESS APPROX. THE LAST 20-30 MINS IS MISSING FROM THE MOVIE. IF POSSIBLE, PLS UPLOAD THE REMAINING PART - RGDS - LOVEPAREEK

aap ko aisa kyon laga ke movie complete nahi hai vhs se rip ke baad upload ki kis jaga aap ko laga ke movie cut ki hai ..........? abhi tak 12-08-12 se lekar almost 50 plus download complete kar chuky hain kisi ne tu kaha nahi ya un 50 logon ne movie nahi dekhi ya download ke baad delete kar di hai bhai koi aur tu batai ke kya maajra hai............?

NAHI MALIK SAHAB, MUJE NAI PATA UN LOGON NE KYU NAHI KAHA, LEKIN MAINE PURI DOWNLOAD KI, USKI CAPACITY (MB) BHI APKE STATED SE CHECK KARI.....MOVIE VASTAV MEIN ADHURI HAI ....END KA KAAFI BARA PART MISSING HAI......AAP DOWNLOAD KARKE DEKHO TO AAP BHI SAHMAT HOGE.....HOWEVER, I STILL EXPRESS MY EGARDS FOR THAT MOVIE BY U SINCE WHATEVER THERE WAS, I ENJOYED THAT TOO....ONLY WANTED TO BRING IT TO YOUR NOTICE - RGDS - LOVEPAREEK
